Murky.name: Slime
Murky.description: Deal 86 (+4% per level) damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%.  Deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

Murky.name: Pufferfish
Murky.description: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 (+5.5% per level) health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

Murky.name: Safety Bubble
Murky.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

Murky.name: March of the Murlocs
Murky.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

Murky.name: Octo-Grab
Murky.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

Murky.name: Spawn Egg
Murky.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying.  If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

1.name: A Fishy Deal
1.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 32 stacks.

1.name: Egg Hunt
1.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

4.name: Living the Dream
4.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Ability Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

4.name: Slime Time
4.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.name: Tufferfish
4.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

7.name: Slippery When Wet
7.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble.  Reduces Safety Bubble's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Time to Krill
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.name: Octo-Grab
10.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.name: Egg Shell
13.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

13.name: Fish Tank
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes grants Murky 75 Physical Armor against Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
13.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

16.name: Fish Oil
16.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.name: Toxic Buildup
16.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.name: Wrath of Cod
16.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
20.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700%.

20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
20.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.name: Making Inky
20.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
20.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.
